csw:Record.dc:title: Global Ocean- Delayed Mode gridded CORA- In-situ Observations objective analysis in Delayed Mode
csw:Record.dct:abstract:
'''Short description:'''' Global Ocean- Gridded objective analysis fields of temperature and salinity using profiles from the reprocessed in-situ global product CORA (INSITU_GLO_TS_REP_OBSERVATIONS_013_001_b) using the ISAS software. Objective analysis is based on a statistical estimation method that allows presenting a synthesis and a validation of the dataset, providing a validation source for operational models, observing seasonal cycle and inter-annual variability.
'''DOI (product) :''' https://doi.org/10.17882/46219
